sense.def:
To prepare something
pomeni poskrbeti, da bo nekaj nared za tisto, kar se bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: A room has been prepared for you.
Schools have to prepare children for life in the community.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To prepare for an event, action, or situation
pomeni narediti vse, da smo nared za neki dogodek, dejanje ali okoliščine.

seg.quote: The guests prepared for their departure.
I was not really prepared for her fits of boredom.

sense.def:
To prepare food
pomeni poskrbeti, da hrana postane taka, da jo je mogoče jesti.

seg.quote: He had spent all morning preparing the meal.
